      • getStory

        Story getStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a story from ES
        Parameters:
        storyId - ID of the story to retrieve
        Returns:
        The Story object
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • getStories

        java.util.List<Story> getStories(int from,
                               int size)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Tries to get "size" stories, starting at "from" from ES. May return less than "size" if end of stories is reached.
        Parameters:
        from - the start index to return stories from
        size - the amount of stories to try to return
        Returns:
        List of stories
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • queryStories

        java.util.List<Story> queryStories(java.lang.String filter,
                                 int from,
                                 int size)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Queries elasticsearch with the provided filter for matching stories Searches across Author, title, tags, and synposis fields
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to search for.
        from - the start index to return stories from
        size - the amount of stories to try to return
        Returns:
        List of stories
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • getFragment

        StoryFragment getFragment(java.util.UUID fragmentId)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a fragment from ES All fragments are UUID so story reference is not needed
        Parameters:
        fragmentId - ID of the fragment to retrieve
        Returns:
        The StoryFragment object
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • getFragmentsForStory

        java.util.List<StoryFragment> getFragmentsForStory(java.util.UUID storyId,
                                                 int from,
                                                 int size)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets fragments for a given story. Will return up to size fragments starting at from.
        Parameters:
        storyId - ID of the story to retrieve all fragments for
        from - the start index to return fragments from
        size - the amount of fragments to try to return
        Returns:
        List of StoryFragments
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • getComments

        java.util.List<Comment> getComments(java.util.UUID targetId,
                                  int from,
                                  int size)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets comments for the targetId. May be a StoryId or FragmentId. Will return up to size comments starting at from. Loads images if a comment contains one as well.
        Parameters:
        targetId - The Story or StoryFragment to retrieve comments for.
        from - the start index to return comments from
        size - the amount of comments to try to return
        Returns:
        A List of comments
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • putComment

        boolean putComment(Comment comment)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Puts a comment to ES. If a comment contains an image, it puts that in ES as well.
        Parameters:
        comment - the Comment to save to ES
        Returns:
        True if succeeded, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteComment

        boolean deleteComment(java.util.UUID commentId)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Deletes a comment from ES. Does not delete a comments image if it contains one.
        Parameters:
        commentId - ID of the comment to delete
        Returns:
        True if succeeded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • publishStory

        boolean publishStory(Story story,
                   java.util.List<StoryFragment> fragments)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Publishes a Story to ES. Overwrites if already exists. Note: this does NOT check if the StoryFragments actually belong to the Story
        Parameters:
        story - the Story object to publish
        fragments - List of StoryFragments to publish
        Returns:
        True if succeeded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

        Image getImage(java.util.UUID imageId)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets an image from elasticsearch
        Parameters:
        imageId - the image to get
        Returns:
        The retrieved Image object
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • getImages

        java.util.List<Image> getImages(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> imageIds)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets images in bulk
        Parameters:
        imageIds - the list of images to retrieve
        Returns:
        A list of images
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception

      • putImage

        boolean putImage(Image image)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Puts an image into elasticsearch. Updates it if it already exists.
        Parameters:
        image - the image to put
        Returns:
        True if succeeded, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        Exception, - connection errors, etc. See JestClient
        java.lang.Exception
